title: Longing: Prequel
description: 'Longing' is a prequel novella to the novel 'Control', which tells the story of two men coming together, one out for justice, the other revenge... Leroy, returns home after serving 8 years in the Special Forces to discover his nightmare has not ended, but is just beginning. After discovering that his sister has been missing for months, Leroy sets out on a mission to find and bring her home. Accepting a management position in an exclusive night club exposes Leroy to a world of crime and corruption he had no idea existed.
author: R.M. Gauthier
